title: Badmanthought
author: Badmanthought
created_time: July 25, 2022, 12:05:17 PMLast edit: October 01, 2022, 08:58:41 PM by Badmanthought
content: WEBSITE ✓ BANK APP ✓ AFCASH APP ✓ TELEGRAM ✓ TWITTER ✓ FACEBOOK ✓  LINKEDIN ✓  DISCORD Rewards will be distributed by team!Escrowed Bounty Tokens Wallet Address | EXLSCAN |Transaction Details | Here  |ABOUT AFRICUNIA BANK AFRICUNIA BANKis a Fintech company, a global digital bank offering decentralised blockchain technology banking, investment banking, cryptocurrencies, SME loans, prepaid visa & mastercard, credit & debit cards, virtual cards, assets & project management services, eShop, utility bills payment, sms, mobile topup and databundle sales and more....We are registered in England under the UK Government’s Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) for Banks and Financial Services. The company is equally registered in Canada as AFRICUNIA Incorporated and is regulated by Canadian FINTRAC.  AFRICUNIA is legally registered in Zambia and Tanzania.  And in Nigeria we are incorporated as AFRICUNIA Nigeria Limited with ‘’AFRICUNIA BANK’’ Trademark.  Our vision is making money transfer simple, secure and easy, cheap and accessible to the less privileged ones and for all through the Blockchain Technology and DeFi.ALLOCATION:Token Allocation = 40,000 AFCASHIEO price = $0.25Twitter: 15%Facebook: 10%Reddit: 8%Telegram: 10Blog & Article: 21%YouTube: 21%Special marketing offer: 15%This bounty will run for four (4) weeks.All participant are required to submit their reports every "FRIDAY" closing time 23:59 forum time, if anyone crosses this deadline of report submission, his/her report will not be accepted or given rewards for it, as the week is considered from Monday to Friday for work.The days of Saturday and Sunday are kept for checking the results, so the final date of report submission would remain Friday only, if anyone submits their reports on Saturday or Sunday, it will not be considered at all, so please do not request it, not going to be considered at all.1st Week = 25/07/2022 - 29 /07/2022 ( Completed)2nd Week = 30/07/2022 - 05/08 /2022 ( Completed)3rd Week = 06/08/2022 - 12 /08/2022 (   Completed )4th Week = 13/08/2022 - 19/08/2022  ( Completed )✓  DO NOT ask any question about bounty campaign in the official group/social media.For bounty related questions and queries | Join The Bounty Plug |✓  All participants must create and Complete registration on Africunia Bank IEO platform to receive reward ✓  All participants must submit AFCASH (EXL20) smart chain wallet address obtained from the token sales platform, or from AFCASH wallet to receive reward.Explorer: |CLICK here for Afcash EXL20 smart contract details|✓  All participants must join AFRICUNIA BANK Official Telegram group | CLICK HERE TO JOIN  |✓  All participants must follow the AFRICUNIA BANK Official Twitter account | CLICK HERE  |✓  All participants must follow the AFRICUNIA BANK Official LinkedIn page | CLICK HERE  |✓  All participants must follow the AFRICUNIA BANK Official Facebook page | CLICK HERE  |✓  All participants must join AFRICUNIA BANK Official Discord community | Click here to join |Using multiple accounts, abusing with bot, cheating, spamming, repeating contents are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty program immediately and all your accounts will be banned permanently.Participants cannot change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.Posts/Tweets/Retweets/Articles cannot be deleted until the end of the bounty campaign.Newbies are welcomed to participate in this campaign although account created after the thread was published will be disqualified from participating.All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program in this threadQuote#JOIN & #Proof of authentication"Name" of Bounty Campaign (Facebook/Twitter/Signature/Blogs/etc)Bitcointalk username:Bitcointalk profile link:Telegram username:All reports (Twitter, Facebook, telegram post link, etc.) should be sent at the end of every week in this thread(UTC Friday until 23:59 by forum time), use reporting format below to submit reports in this thread. No quoting of your previous reports. Participants cannot delete posts/tweets/retweets/videos/articles until the end of the bounty campaign.Quoteweekly Report FormatWeek dates 26.04 - 04.05"Name" of Bounty Campaign (Facebook/Twitter/LinkedIn/Reddit)Telegram @username:Link to your Facebook/Twitter profileLinks to your own posts and reposts/retweets[/sizeRules:✔️  You most add Africunia Bank official website link or IEO website in your post.✓  All participants must follow the Official Twitter account and must retweet and like at least 3 latest tweets by @africuniabank✓ Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 50 followers and be original (90% in twitter audit for the last 1 month) and be registered for more than 3 months. Each participant can have only one account registered in the campaign.✓ Make 5 original tweets with more than 74 characters per week but no more than 2 posts per day and reshare every of Africunia Bank recent posts. ✓ Post about AFRICUNIA BANK token salesYou can make use of any of the hashtags below❌Don't start your post with an hashtags, this is a very bad posting technique, hashtags should come last✅Use a maximum of 5hashtags#Africunia #africuniabank $AFCASH #afcash #exl20 #afcashwallet #blockchian #crypto #cryptolife #BTC #BNB #ETH #digitalization #digitalassets #saving #ExcoincialSmartChain #fintech #banking✓ Comments should be original & no hashtags.Reward► 50 - 1000 followers: 10 Stake/week►1001 - 2500 followers: 20 Stake/week► 2501 - 3500 followers:  30 Stake/week► 3501 - 4500 followers:  40 Stake/week► 4501 - 10000 followers: 50 Stake/week► Have 10001 and above followers: 100 Stake/week Rules:✔️  You most add Africunia Bank official website link or IEO website in your post.✓  All participants must like and share the Official Facebook Page of Africunia Bank✓  Make 5 original posts with more than 75 characters and 3 shares of latest posts from Official Facebook Page of AFRICUNIA BANK per week but no more than 2 posts per day.  Hashtag listed below should be added in the post and All post must mention AFRICUNIA BANK project.✓ Post about AFRICUNIA BANK token sales✓  Facebook accounts must have a minimum of 500 friends/followers and must be original and be registered for more than 3 months. Each participant can have only one account registered in the campaign.You can make use of any of the hashtags below❌Don't start your post with an hashtags, this is a very bad posting technique, hashtags should come last✅Use a maximum of 5hashtags#Africunia #africuniabank $AFCASH #afcash #exl20 #afcashwallet #blockchian #crypto #cryptolife #BTC #BNB #ETH #digitalization #digitalassets #saving #ExcoincialSmartChain #fintech #banking✓  Comment on at least 3 posts of the Official Facebook Page. Comments should be original & no hashtags.Reward► 50 - 1000 friends: 10 Stake/week►1001 - 2500 friends: 20 Stake/week► 2501 - 3500 friends:  30 Stake/week► 3501 - 4500 friends:  40 Stake/week► 4501 - 10000 friends: 50 Stake/week► Have 10001 and above friends: 100 Stake/week  All participants must join the Official Telegram group of  Africunia Bank  ✓ Make 10+ posts per week in Telegram Groups that are cryptocurrency related with more than 1000 members.✓ Content of each post must be different and unique. Repeating messages and deleted messages will be deemed as invalid.✓ Any scamming or abusing messages by the bot will be deemed as invalid and be added to the blacklist.Reward♦️ 15+ posts: 50 Stake per week Rules:1. Blogs and Sites eligible for this bounty campaign are:-Hackernoon-Medium-Quora-Reddit-Steemit-LinkedIn2. The blog/article must be focused on the relevant topic. It must convey positively about AFRICUNIA BANK.3. It must be written in your own words. If you copy any content from site or whitepaper, then it is going to be rejected.3. Blog posts must have at least 350 words.4. The posting account must have at least 500 followers/subscribers.5. Only original content will be accepted, rest are going to be rejected immediately.6. Articles must be available till the end of this campaign. Removal/deletion of post prior to that will result in disqualification and no stakes.7. The article must have a link to our website, telegram channel and Bitcointalk Ann thread.8. URL Shortener links (TinyURL, Bit.ly, etc.) will not be valid.9. Please provide your Bitcointalk username and profile at the end of the article so that the authenticity can be verified and easy to define stakes for you.Rewards:1. Low Quality: 2 stakes2. Average Quality: 4 stakes3. High Quality: 6 stakes Rules:Produce a good review video of the AFRICUNIA BANK by following the below norms:1. All content will be judged by the criteria: quality, views and effects.2. Video must be at least 2 minutes, videos shorter are not accepted.3. Your channel should be at least 2 months old.4. Your channel must have at least 500 subscribers and video must get 500 views to qualify.5. You should make the video in English language or any other major languages.6. You will receive a reward at the end of the week, depending on the quality and popularity of your work.7. The video must be original. Copying graphics, text and other content are not allowed. (You can use official images, logos, images posted on websites, ANN-topic, Twitter, Facebook Telegram and discord).8. To prove authorship, our ANN Thread link must be added to the video description along with your username on Bitcointalk.Rewards:1. Low Quality: 2 stakes2. Average Quality: 4 stakes3. High Quality: 6 stakes4. 5000+ Subscribers: 1 stakes5. 10000+ Subscribers: 2 stakes6. 50000+ Subscribers: 3 stakes Rules:1. We reserve the right to not consider your Reddit account eligible if you are extremely low quality/bot etc.2. Your account must be at least 2 months old and have at least 50 posts or comment karma.3. External posts must link to the AFRICUNIA BANK website.4. Posts with negative karma will obviously not be accepted. Any kind of spam will not be rewarded either.5. Your post must be made in Crypto related or Fintech subreddit pages.6. We will award tokens based on the quality of the post. This will be based on the quality of the content, a number of upvotes, karma and how many comments it generates etc. We may take other criteria into account.7. Post must be at least 50 characters summarizing the project.8. You can complete a total of 4 posts per week. A maximum of 1 posts per day.9. Low-quality contents will be denied without pay.Stakes will be paid depending on karma (at the start of the campaign).30-60 post karma/ comment karma : 1 stake per week61-100 post karma/ comment karma : 2 stake per week101-300 post karma/ comment karma : 3 stake per week301+ post karma/ comment karma : 4 stake per week This Bounty is managed by Bad-Man-Thought
